name: Cleanup Crew (Coverup Studios)
description:
You are a volunteer working to clean up the oceans. Using vacuums you must suck trash out of the oceans, but watch out, too much trash can clog your engine and cause damage to the boat!

Teamseas is making sure you get paid for picking trash out of the oceans. Use this money to buy more vacuums and make the world a better place!

Controls:

-Click to activate vacuum

-A and D or left and right arrows to turn ship
